sources.title: Live Fast Live Free (South of the River) | Full Rock Drama Movie
sources.description:
Live Fast Live Free (South of the River) - Front man Aaron lives life to the full. He has it all, the mates, the band, a girl - and cancer. When he meets someone new, he comes to a crossroads where only he can decide whether to rock until he drops or grow up to survive.
2020.  Stars: Alex Gillison, Joe Watkins, Alexandra Metaxa
